title: YNaara Store
description: Online store created for YNaara Designs. This application works as a shopping cart to keep the user's order until they decide to complete the purchase. Since YNaara prefers to serve its buyers through WhatsApp Messenger, the application generates a personalized message to the number designated by YNaara to complete the order.

title: Antojitos Frit Store
description: Antijitos Frit is an Ecommerce website. The objective of this application was to automate the online sales of a snack shop. The application includes a payment gateway and inventory control, these data are reflected in the application.
